thread.title: Joanne Haley
thread.title_full: Chocolate Trading Company reviewed by Joanne Haley

author: Joanne Haley
title: Joanne Haley
text:
Excellent service from Chocolate Trading Company. They answered any questions I had before I placed by order. Quick and easy to use website/ordering service. My order arrived within a couple of days and was very well packaged.
Would definitely use this company again.
